# External Data Files (Section 18 â€“ ceRNA Network)

These files are **not included** in the repository due to size and licensing constraints.
Download them manually and place them in this directory before running Section 18.

| File | Source | URL |
|------|--------|-----|
| `miRTarBase_MTI.csv` | miRTarBase | https://mirtarbase.cuhk.edu.cn |
| `ENCORI_miRNA_lncRNA.tsv` | ENCORI / starBase | https://rnasysu.com/encori |

The script will skip Section 18 with a warning if either file is missing.
